original_text: This is my advice to you. Bring together all the soldiers in Israel. Tell them to come from everywhere in the land, from Dan to Beersheba. There will be as many of them as the sand on the shore of the sea. Then you yourself should lead the whole army into the battle.
korean_text: 나는 이렇게 계략을 세웠나이다 온 이스라엘을 단부터 브엘세바까지 바닷가의 많은 모래 같이 당신께로 모으고 친히 전장에 나가시고

sentences.original_text: This is my advice to you.
Bring together all the soldiers in Israel.
Tell them to come from everywhere in the land,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들에게 땅의 모든 곳에서 오라고 말하십시오.

sentences.original_text: There will be as many of them
as the sand on the shore of the sea.
Then you yourself should lead the whole army
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 당신 스스로가 군대 전체를 이끌어야 합니다.
